chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: This is our last topic CSS Validation

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Before starting this, let me tell you that

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will tell you some tips and tools

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: which an experienced web developer uses

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: You will get it in HTML and CSS playlist

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: After seeing all the tips and tools

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: we will make a PhD to HTML

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will not use any framework

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will use it later when I will tell you bootstrap

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Then we will make another PhD to HTML

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: But now we will make it on pure CSS

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now let's see what is CSS Validation and how to do it

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: In CSS Validation, you validate whatever you have written

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: You have to go to Google and type CSS Validation

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: You will get a link

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: The first link is the CSS Validator

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: You can do it in 3 ways

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Either you put a URL, upload a file or put the direct CSS

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will do one thing

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will open a website

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will do one thing

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will show you the URL first

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Then I will show you the file and then I will show you the direct CSS

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Our website is open

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now I will press CTRL U and I will find style.css

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Style.css

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Style.css

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Style.css

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Style.css

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Our min.css is ready

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: This is our min.css

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will copy this URL and I will give my URL address

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will write check

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: When it will check, it will tell us where is the error

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: It said congratulations, no error found

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now if I save it

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will save it on desktop

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I have saved it on desktop

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now I will upload the file

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will choose the file and go to the desktop

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now it is telling us that there is no error

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now if I want to open it on my code editor

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will press CTRL A and CTRL C

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will go to direct input and paste it

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will write check

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: It will tell us that there is no error

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Now what you were seeing was a minified file

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: We minimize CSS

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: I will tell you all this in the next lectures

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: What is a minified version and what are the benefits

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: If you like this video, please like it

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: Subscribe to the channel

chunks.title: CSS Tutorial in Hindi [Part 51] -  CSS Validation
chunks.text: So that you don't have to search for the channel again

text: This is our last topic CSS Validation Before starting this, let me tell you that I will tell you some tips and tools which an experienced web developer uses You will get it in HTML and CSS playlist After seeing all the tips and tools we will make a PhD to HTML I will not use any framework I will use it later when I will tell you bootstrap Then we will make another PhD to HTML But now we will make it on pure CSS Now let's see what is CSS Validation and how to do it In CSS Validation, you validate whatever you have written You have to go to Google and type CSS Validation You will get a link The first link is the CSS Validator You can do it in 3 ways Either you put a URL, upload a file or put the direct CSS I will do one thing I will open a website I will do one thing I will show you the URL first Then I will show you the file and then I will show you the direct CSS Our website is open Now I will press CTRL U and I will find style.css Style.css Style.css Style.css Style.css Our min.css is ready This is our min.css I will copy this URL and I will give my URL address I will write check When it will check, it will tell us where is the error It said congratulations, no error found Now if I save it I will save it on desktop I have saved it on desktop Now I will upload the file I will choose the file and go to the desktop Now it is telling us that there is no error Now if I want to open it on my code editor I will press CTRL A and CTRL C I will go to direct input and paste it I will write check It will tell us that there is no error Now what you were seeing was a minified file We minimize CSS I will tell you all this in the next lectures What is a minified version and what are the benefits If you like this video, please like it Subscribe to the channel So that you don't have to search for the channel again
